CustomField.description: --DEPRECATED-- Replaced by Service_Shopped_For__c. The user marks this optional boolean field to true when borrowers shop for a service for fees, costs, and adjustments rather than using the financial-institution-recommended service. By default, it is blank.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: This user-populated field displays when the customer shops for a service for fees, costs, and adjustments.
CustomField.label: -D Shopped For
